channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Anthropic Releases A New ‘Constitution’ For Claude
item.description: With a newly published constitution for its Claude model, Anthropic is teaching AI not just what to avoid but why certain boundaries exist.

item.title: ‘Return To Silent Hill’ Is The Worst-Reviewed Video Game Movie In 19 Years
item.description: Return to Silent Hill is in theaters this weekend, arriving with the lowest Rotten Tomatoes score in nearly two decades of video game movies.

item.title: Fed's favored inflation gauge shows consumer prices remained elevated in November
item.description: The Commerce Department's delayed November PCE inflation report showed that inflation remained well above the Federal Reserve's 2% target rate.

item.title: Here Are The 2026 Best Picture Oscar Nominees Ranked By Rotten Tomatoes Score
item.description: Here are the 10 2026 Best Picture Oscar nominees and how they stack up in terms of critic and audience Rotten Tomatoes score.

item.title: Why AI’s greatest challenge is leadership, not innovation
item.description: CEOs reveal how AI, social media and bold leadership are shaping the future of business.

item.title: Built to last: governance for multigenerational family businesses
item.description: When starting a company, nimble decision-making and founder-led intuition are often hallmarks of success. More structure is needed with complexity.

item.title: GameStop shuttering 30 New York locations as part of nationwide closures linked to falling sales
item.description: GameStop is expected to close doors of around 30 New York locations as part of massive nationwide shutdown affecting 470 stores by the month's end.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
